snippet: Efforts to end mortgage and foreclosure abuses remain far too weak.
abstract: Editorial contends government efforts to hold banks accountable for mortgage and foreclosure abuses remain far too weak; welcomes New York Atty Gen Eric Schneiderman's plan to sue Wells Fargo and Bank of America for failing to adhere to settlement designed to provide relief for homeowners; urges other prosecutors to follow Schneiderman's lead, since potential for continued abuses still exists.
lead_paragraph: Efforts to end mortgage and foreclosure abuses remain far too weak.

headline.seo: Banks Still Behaving Badly on Mortgages
